translations: 引起……的兴趣；使迷惑；策划阴谋（intrigue 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: The idea that all energy and wealth comes from the sun really intrigued him.
sentences.translation: 所有的能量和资源都来自太阳的想法引起了他的兴趣。

sentences.sentence: He was intrigued by her story.
You've really intrigued me—tell me more!
sentences.translation: 你说的真有意思—再给我讲一些吧！
